1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: Brasília, 2060. Political conflicts and violent revolutions led to the devastation of the world order, its population left to its own resorts. The old Brazilian federal capital was abandoned in unrecognizable ruins, only a handful of old inhabitants still roam through the cerrado, isolated from the rest of the nation. Until one by one, they vanish. After her best friend Igor goes missing, Cássia decides to seek him out but her path leads her towards many other uncovered mysteries about the city she lives in.

2.title: Episode #1.2
2.plot: The invasion of the souk puts everyone in danger. But in the midst of the chaos, Cássia comes upon an unlikely help.

3.title: Episode #1.3
3.plot: Cassia and Inês decide to take cover for the night, after all they don't know what other dangers await them outside - But what Cassia certainly did not expect was just how much the other girl could get under her skin.

4.title: Episode #1.4
4.plot: Against her wishes, Cássia ends up growing closer to her new companion. Together, they leave the the safety of the apartment in order to find more clues that could lead them to the missing people.

5.title: Episode #1.5
5.plot: After the most recent events, Cássia finds herself in the strange position of having to console her newest friend. Its in the midst of the heartbreaking destruction that they begin to uncover the real mystery behind the city.

6.title: Episode #1.6
6.plot: Cássia sets off after the few clues they have about the disappearance of her friend, but the answers she finds might just be more than she can handle..

imdb.plot outline: It's 2060 and the Brazilian nation is thrown into disarray. Its once proud capital Brasilia has been left abandoned and forgotten, inhabited only by a handful of wandering citizens - until, that is, they start mysteriously disappearing - Cassia's world shifts when her best friend is taken from her and, soon, the entire population is in danger. With the help of Inês, a young, strong-willed aide from a nearby commune, Cass embarks on a desperate search for their fellow citizens, realizing only too late the real mysteries hidden beneath the city's careful design.
imdb.title: Eixos
plot: It's 2060 and the Brazilian nation is thrown into disarray. Its once proud capital Brasilia has been left abandoned and forgotten, inhabited only by a handful of wandering citizens - until, that is, they start mysteriously disappearing - Cassia's world shifts when her best friend is taken from her and, soon, the entire population is in danger. With the help of Inês, a young, strong-willed aide from a nearby commune, Cass embarks on a desperate search for their fellow citizens, realizing only too late the real mysteries hidden beneath the city's careful design.::_Eixos_ (qv)
